channel.title: Teleport lighting up
channel.description:
Sorry for the crappy pictures i had to use printscreen but i need help. I added sprites so that teleport orbs will light up. After adding it i had no problem hovering over home button and it showed the teleporting information (was already litten up) [img]http://i.imgur.com/1MCZAl4.png[/img]
After hovering over other teleports i noticed it had no information like so. [img]http://i.imgur.com/mq5j6JR.png[/img]
Anyone help please? -.-
